"Astarte": "You have met the requirements for your next stamp card. Here you go."
"This card focuses on Time Attack Quests."
"Your first objective is to clear the Time Attack Quest <c bb0000>[Marathon Training: Naberius II]<c>."
"Since this exercise will take you through the Ruins, you will need access to that area first."
"Specifically, you will need to have completed the quest <c bb0000>[Wolgahda Extermination]<c> beforehand."

"なお、すでに目標達成済みでしたら
引き続いてスタンプを押させて
